body.p: Welcome to the Bancroft! We are proud to serve our guests the highest quality ingredients in food and drink, as well as to provide them with top-notch service and care. Our service style is inspired by a fine-dining ethos, but without the all the stuffiness of a “white tablecloth” experience. We believe in cultivating a staff that is as knowledgeable as possible about our product, therefore giving our guests exactly what they need. Happy guests will take care of you, if you take care of them! You were hired because of both your unique service background and your dynamic personality, so don’t be afraid to infuse your own personal touch when you follow our steps of service!
